shelf_items.title: Import Asset
shelf_items.description: Imports a Megascans asset or generic texture item as a new context. Geometry gets imported also and materials are automatically assigned.

shelf_items.title: Mix Surfaces
shelf_items.description: Mixes multiple selected surfaces with a cover surface. You can quickly cover multiple objects with dirt or snow.

shelf_items.title: Add Surface(s) to Mix
shelf_items.description: Adds the selected surfaces to an existing mix.

shelf_items.title: Textures to Triplanar
shelf_items.description: Converts the selected texture(s) to triplanar.

shelf_items.title: Replace Surface
shelf_items.description: Replaces the selected surfaces and updates the mapping.

shelf_items.title: Toggle Surface Complexity
shelf_items.description: Temporarily converts the selected surface to a simple PhysicalDiffuse material and disables the Displacement map. This can be handy when mixing two materials to reduce overhead.

shelf_items.title: Generate Decimated Point Cloud
shelf_items.description: Quickly generate a decimated point cloud from the selected object with several selectors for masking.

shelf_items.title: Moisten Surface
shelf_items.description: Adds a wet layer on top of the selected surface. Requires Diffuse, Specular and Roughness texture map files to be set in your material.

shelf_items.title: Quick Blend
shelf_items.description: Creates a blend or multiblend mix when two or more Textures(any type), Normal Maps, Displacement Maps are selected or a MaterialPhysicalBlend or MaterialPhysicalMultiBlend node if two or more Physical materials are selected.

shelf_items.title: Mask Blend Nodes
shelf_items.description: Adds selectors to the selected blend nodes.

shelf_items.title: Tint Surface
shelf_items.description: Tints the diffuse with a custom color. Handy when you blend two materials together and when they look different.

shelf_items.title: (Un)Stream Textures
shelf_items.description: Converts selected regular map files to TextureStreamedMapFile and vice versa.

shelf_items.title: Convert Textures
shelf_items.description: Converts selected textures to another file type.

shelf_items.title: Reconvert Selected Textures
shelf_items.description: Scans each of the selected textures folder for updated source files and reconverts them if needed.

shelf_items.title: Import Megascans Library
shelf_items.description: Imports the whole or selected categories of the Megascans Library. Already existing items will be ignored.

shelf_items.title: Megascans Bridge
shelf_items.description: Starts the Megascans Bridge listener for incoming requests. Make sure Command Port is enabled.

shelf_items.title: Setup Heightmap
shelf_items.description: Imports a heightmap and displaces it on a polygrid. Can also generate a low resolution proxy.

shelf_items.title: Toggle all map color space to ACES or Clarisse
shelf_items.description: After you change your Color Management configuration via preferences this script allows you to fix the color spaces of all textures.
